metadata.description:
6 years ago I received a package from 5,000 miles away. My ex-girlfriend from Buenos Aires had shipped me a shoebox full of mementos from our relationship and a goodbye note. I remember receiving the package and sitting with it for a few minutes in silence before picking up my guitar. I sat on the floor at the base of my couch, and this song came out in a matter of 15 minutes or so.

Disposable is the first song that I wrote and released as a solo artist in 2017. Throughout 2017-18 I hosted artist showcases in my basement to spotlight student artists at my university - the cover art for this drop is a photo from one of the first of those shows where I debuted my EP "Purple Line". The golden egg is the album artwork of that EP - my first and only release as Oddentity. That night was my first time ever performing original music - it was an intense and beautiful moment that I will never forget.

Written and Produced by AL3C
Add. Vocals by Ogi
Keys by KEYON
Saxophone by Louis Danowsky
Mix by Rat City Sound
Master by Classick Studios

lyrics.text:
Some part of me still has feelings for the girl that I thought you should be,
One ounce of self-doubt when I met you would've been all the proof that I'd need,
Somewhere in my heart time stops when I dream of you crying yourself to sleep,
Still I've got too much growing I'm slow didn't notice my mind playing tricks on me, was blind now I see

Are you reading me? Don't leave me out here stuck in the dark no,
I'm feeling you with all of my heart girl,
I guess it's just disposable trust, this disposable trust,
What did you need from me? I invested all I could from the start yeah,
and I've already played all my cards now,
I guess it's just disposable love, this disposable love that's got me going wild

Six months is time enough to keep me coming back to you,
It's not that I need the companionship, but loneliness can be taxing too,
You're all I ever wanted for a period of my life, but I barely knew myself my dreams abated by the strife,
Am I getting it right?
Might twist the past like a knife

Are you reading me? Don't leave me out here stuck in the dark no,
I'm feeling you with all of my heart girl,
I guess it's just disposable trust, this disposable trust,
What did you need from me? I invested all I could from the start yeah,
and I've already played all my cards now,
I guess it's just disposable love, this disposable love that's got me going wild

metadata.name: DISPOSABLE #1
metadata.title: DISPOSABLE
